item.title: Samba server setup on Ubuntu
item.description: Samba Install samba Link to heading sudo apt update sudo apt install samba Add samba user for yourself Link to heading sudo smbpasswd -a $USER sudo usermod -a -G sambashare $USER net usershare add priv ~/Documents/priv "My Documents" $USER:f,everyone:d guest_ok=n Edit config Link to heading sudo nano /etc/samba/smb.conf sudo service smbd restart Add accounts for others Link to heading sudo useradd -M -G sambashare karen sudo passwd -l karen net usershare add documents ~/Documents/shared "Shared Documents" $USER:f,karen:f,everyone:d guest_ok=n Verify users and shares Link to heading sudo pdbedit -L -v net usershare info --long Configure firewall Link to heading sudo ufw allow from 192.
